an5.250:4.3: Yasmiṃ, bhikkhave, puggale puggalo abhippasanno hoti, so tathārūpaṃ āpattiṃ āpanno hoti yathārūpāya āpattiyā saṅgho ukkhipati.
an5.250:4.5: ‘yo kho myāyaṃ puggalo piyo manāpo so saṅghena ukkhitto’ti.
an5.250:4.7: Bhikkhūsu appasādabahulo samāno aññe bhikkhū na bhajati.
an5.250:4.8: Aññe bhikkhū abhajanto saddhammaṃ na suṇāti.
an5.250:5.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, yasmiṃ puggale puggalo abhippasanno hoti, so tathārūpaṃ āpattiṃ āpanno hoti yathārūpāya āpattiyā saṅgho ante nisīdāpeti.
an5.250:5.3: ‘yo kho myāyaṃ puggalo piyo manāpo so saṅghena ante nisīdāpito’ti.
an5.250:5.5: Bhikkhūsu appasādabahulo samāno aññe bhikkhū na bhajati.
an5.250:5.6: Aññe bhikkhū abhajanto saddhammaṃ na suṇāti.
an5.250:6.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, yasmiṃ puggale puggalo abhippasanno hoti, so disāpakkanto hoti … pe … so vibbhanto hoti … pe … so kālaṅkato hoti.
an5.250:6.3: ‘yo kho myāyaṃ puggalo piyo manāpo so kālaṅkato’ti.
an5.250:6.5: Aññe bhikkhū abhajanto saddhammaṃ na suṇāti.
an5.250:6.8: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā puggalappasāde”ti.
